text: Admiral Brown may refer to: *William Brown (admiral) (1777–1857), also known in Spanish as Guillermo Brown or Almirante Brown, a hero of Argentina *George Brown (Admiral) (1835–1913), an American naval officer *Wilson Brown (admiral) (1881–1957), World War II naval commander *William Brown (Royal Navy officer) (1764–1814), an officer (Rear-Admiral) of the British Royal Navy during the Napoleonic Wars *Nancy Elizabeth Brown, American Vice Admiral serving as the Director, Command, Control, Communications and Computer Systems *Erroll M. Brown, a retired Rear Admiral in the United States Coast Guard, and the first African-American promoted to flag rank *Annette E. Brown, a retired Rear Admiral of the United States Navy
title: Admiral Brown
